text: Impulse is the debut studio album by American progressive metalcore band Erra. It was released on November 30, 2011 through Tragic Hero Records and was produced by Brian Hood. It is their only album with founding bassist Adam Hicks. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== ;Erra * Garrison Lee – unclean vocals * Jesse Cash – guitar, bass, clean vocals * Alan Rigdon – guitar, bass, backing vocals * Adam Hicks – bass * Alex Ballew – drums ;Additional personnel * Brian Hood – production, engineering ==References== Category:2011 debut albums Category:Erra albums Category:Tragic Hero Records albums
title: Impulse (Erra album)
